desc: The soothing, natural clay-based mask helps heal blemishes, prevent breakouts and keep skin shine-free Medicated formula with acne-fighting salicylic acid goes deep to clean and unclog pores, rid skin of excess oil. In just 10 minutes, the skin looks clearer and feels smoother and less congested.

layout.text: Smoother Cleaner Skin in Less than 10 Minutes
Instantly Enhance your skin's appearance today
